content: a moss stitch cardigan with oversized feature sleeves made in 5 pieces front back and sleeves and seamed together customizable length cropped to full and in sizes xs 5xl you will need aran/worsted weight yarn 5mm/h and 6mm/j hooks scissors and needle for finishing concentration level beginner intermediate level garment pattern as gauge is important but minimal increase and decrease stitches the pattern is written for a classic fit with 2 of positive ease and sitting slightly below the waist sleeves are designed for a loose balloon style fit size up for a more oversized cardigan size guide xs -- 30 -- 903 / 421 s -- 34 -- 998 / 465 m -- 38 -- 1067 / 498 l -- 42 -- 1164 / 543 xl -- 46 -- 1237 / 577 2x -- 50 -- 1322 / 617 3x -- 54 -- 1392 / 649 4x -- 58 -- 1460 / 681 5x -- 62 -- 1538 / 717
